title: World Globe
summaries: The World Globe is a thrown consumable item sold by the Zoologist after the Bestiary is 50% complete (270 entries). Once a World Globe is thrown and shatters on a surface, the background for the current biome changes permanently for the current world, to a random one of the backgrounds available for that biome. This lasts until another World Globe is thrown. The World Globe can be used in any biome.

statistics.Tooltip:
Toss it to change how the world looks!
'Time for a change of scenery'
statistics.Buy: 3
statistics.Sell: 60
